verses.verse: I urge <S%G3870><s%> you therefore, <S%G3767><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> by the mercies <S%G3628><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> to present <S%G3936><s%> your bodies <S%G4983><s%> a living <S%G2198><s%> and holy <S%G40><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> [which is] your spiritual <S%G3050><s%> service <S%G2999><s%> of worship. <S%G2999><s%>

And do not be conformed <S%G4964><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> but be transformed <S%G3339><s%> by the renewing <S%G342><s%> of your mind, <S%G3563><s%> that you may prove <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is, that which <S%G18><s%> is good <S%G18><s%> and acceptable <S%G2101><s%> and perfect. <S%G5046><s%>

For through <S%G1223><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to me I say <S%G3004><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G3956><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you not to think <S%G5252><s%> more <S%G5252><s%> highly <S%G5252><s%> of himself than <S%G3844><s%> he ought <S%G1163><s%> to think; <S%G5426><s%> but to think <S%G5426><s%> so <S%G1519><s%> as to have <S%G4993><s%> sound <S%G4993><s%> judgment, <S%G4993><s%> as God <S%G2316><s%> has allotted <S%G3307><s%> to each <S%G1538><s%> a measure <S%G3358><s%> of faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For just <S%G2509><s%> as we have <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the members <S%G3196><s%> do not have <S%G2192><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> function, <S%G4234><s%>

so <S%G3779><s%> we, who are many, <S%G4183><s%> are one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and individually <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of another. <S%G240><s%>

And since we have <S%G2192><s%> gifts <S%G5486><s%> that differ <S%G1313><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to us, [let each exercise them accordingly]: if <S%G1535><s%> prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the proportion <S%G356><s%> of his faith; <S%G4102><s%>
if <S%G1535><s%> service, <S%G1248><s%> in his serving; <S%G1248><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> he who teaches, <S%G1321><s%> in his teaching; <S%G1319><s%>

or <S%G1535><s%> he who exhorts, <S%G3870><s%> in his exhortation; <S%G3874><s%> he who gives, <S%G3330><s%> with liberality; <S%G572><s%> he who leads, <S%G4291><s%> with diligence; <S%G4710><s%> he who shows <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> with cheerfulness. <S%G2432><s%>
Let love <S%G26><s%> be without <S%G505><s%> hypocrisy. <S%G505><s%> Abhor <S%G655><s%> what <S%G4190><s%> is evil; <S%G4190><s%> cling <S%G2853><s%> to what <S%G18><s%> is good. <S%G18><s%>

Be devoted <S%G5387><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> in brotherly <S%G5360><s%> love; <S%G5360><s%> give <S%G4285><s%> preference <S%G4285><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> in honor; <S%G5092><s%>
not lagging <S%G3636><s%> behind <S%G3636><s%> in diligence, <S%G4710><s%> fervent <S%G2204><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> serving <S%G1398><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>
rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> in hope, <S%G1680><s%> persevering <S%G5278><s%> in tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> devoted <S%G4342><s%> to prayer, <S%G4335><s%>
contributing <S%G2841><s%> to the needs <S%G5532><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> practicing <S%G1377><s%> hospitality. <S%G5381><s%>
Bless <S%G2127><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who persecute <S%G1377><s%> you; bless <S%G2127><s%> and curse <S%G2672><s%> not.
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> with those who rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> and weep <S%G2799><s%> with those who weep. <S%G2799><s%>

Be of the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another; <S%G240><s%> do not be haughty <S%G5308><s%> in mind, <S%G5426><s%> but associate <S%G4879><s%> with the lowly. <S%G5011><s%> Do not be wise <S%G5429><s%> in your own <S%G1438><s%> estimation. <S%G1438><s%>

Never <S%G3367><s%> pay <S%G591><s%> back <S%G591><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for evil <S%G2556><s%> to anyone. <S%G3367><s%> Respect <S%G4306><s%> what <S%G2570><s%> is right <S%G2570><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> possible, <S%G1415><s%> so far <S%G3588><s%> as it depends <S%G1537><s%> on you, be at peace <S%G1514><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

Never <S%G3361><s%> take <S%G1556><s%> your own <S%G1438><s%> revenge, <S%G1556><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> but leave <S%G1325><s%> room <S%G5117><s%> for the wrath <S%G3709><s%> [of God,] for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Vengeance <S%G1557><s%> is Mine, <S%G1699><s%> I will repay, <S%G467><s%>" says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

"But if <S%G1437><s%> your enemy <S%G2190><s%> is hungry, <S%G3983><s%> feed <S%G5595><s%> him, and if <S%G1437><s%> he is thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> give <S%G4222><s%> him a drink; <S%G4222><s%> for in so <S%G3778><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> you will heap <S%G4987><s%> burning <S%G4442><s%> coals <S%G440><s%> upon his head. <S%G2776><s%>"
Do not be overcome <S%G3528><s%> by evil, <S%G2556><s%> but overcome <S%G3528><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> with good. <S%G18><s%>
